r.s: Trackback - A generic class for sending and receiving trackbacks.
r.d: A generic class for sending and receiving trackbacks.
r.n: * Fixed Bug #5667: HTTP_Request::getRequestCode( ) - no such function for the latest HTTP_Request. * Fixed Bug #6341: Undefined variable on line 315 & 378. * Fixed reference issues. * Fixed small issue in continuous spam checks. * Fix PEAR_Error issue in test cases. * Added development environment include_path settings to test runner.
